channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: You’ll Need at Least $10 Million for a Chance to Own This Spectacular Frank Frazetta ‘Conan’ Art
item.description: 'Conan the Conqueror (Berzerker)' was created in 1967 for a Robert E. Howard paperback cover and is now revered as a masterpiece of fantasy art.

item.title: Russian Robot Faceplants on Stage During Moscow Showcase
item.description: The humanoid robot industry is still a little shaky on its feet.

item.title: 5 things we want from the Samsung Galaxy S26 and Galaxy S26 Ultra
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 series could launch early next year, and we hope it will have some of these features.

item.title: Citizens Bank is closing more than a dozen branches in 7 states: See the list of the doomed locations
item.description: The closures, which are expected early next year, come as the financial services company continues to regularly review its physical footprint. Last week, Fast Company reported that regional banking giant TD Bank is planning to close more than 50 U.S. locations by the end of January.

item.title: The best budget robot vacuums
item.description: Today’s robot vacuums are becoming a bit like cars: with all the features, upgrades, and fancy trimmings available these days, it’s easy to forget that they can just be simple machines that get us from point A to point B. Yes, some bots blow hot air on their bums (mop pads), deftly navigate dog poop, […]

item.title: ‘Marvel Rivals’ DPS Mains, Please Just Let Me Play That Nice Cajun Man
item.description: A humble plea from your strategist friends.

item.title: This superb turntable is so poised and revealing, but its hefty price and lack of a basic ingredient won't please everyone
item.description: The Technics SL-1300G turntable is the latest example of the premium brand delivering a premium product a decade into its second coming...

item.title: This ARM-based mini PC sports a full x16 PCIe slot for discrete GPUs - Minisforum says "desktop ARM" starts now, but can it live up to the hype?
item.description: Minisforum MS-R1 ARM mini PC offers discrete GPU support, expandable storage, UEFI boot, and 45 TOPS AI performance in compact form.

item.title: DHS Kept Chicago Police Records for Months in Violation of Domestic Espionage Rules
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security collected data on Chicago residents accused of gang ties to test if police files could feed an FBI watchlist. Months passed before anyone noticed it wasn’t deleted.

item.title: MSNBC is changing its name and embracing the ethos of a startup
item.description: Saturday is when MSNBC officially becomes MS NOW, standing for My Source for News, Opinion and the World. Asked what viewers should expect when television’s MSNBC makes its corporate divorce from NBC News final this weekend, network president Rebecca Kutler points to a poster on the wall of a conference room at its new offices off Times Square.

item.title: Anthropic and Microsoft announce new AI data center projects in Texas, New York, and Georgia
item.description: The latest deals show that the tech industry is moving forward on huge spending to build energy-hungry AI infrastructure, despite concerns. Artificial intelligence company Anthropic announced a $50 billion investment in computing infrastructure on Wednesday that will include new data centers in Texas and New York.

item.title: New Nvidia DGX Spark competitor shows strong benchmark performance - and at half the price, could it be enough to convince some users to switch?
item.description: GMKtec EVO-X2 delivers AI workstation performance at half the cost of the DGX Spark.
